location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from J Arthur, Lieutenant Commanding H.C.C. Benares, to James Dow, Acting Resident in Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter relates to an incident on board the Company ship Udny. Arthur states that at the request of Captain Woodly, Commanding Officer of the Udny, he instigated an investigation into the 'misterious conduct' of John O'Heale, and encloses the result of that investigation (not included in the file).
